QuestData.Title: The Missing Driver
QuestData.Description: My driver went running off after the sprites just after they attacked. I don't think they'll really do him any harm, but I need him back to help me clean up the mess by the cart.$B$BHe chased them off towards the cliffs to the north. If you head that direction, you should find him quickly.
QuestData.CompletionText: I should have been more careful.
